LanguageData.Hediffs_MoveSpeedLv1.label: Binshō Step Lv.1
LanguageData.Hediffs_MoveSpeedLv1.description: Tip 1: Binshō (Agile) Step. Across the various skills, you can get up to 16 permanent buffs.
LanguageData.Hediffs_MoveSpeedLv2.label: Binshō Step Lv.2
LanguageData.Hediffs_MoveSpeedLv2.description: Tip 2: Level 3 and 4 of this buff grant permanent buffs.
LanguageData.Hediffs_MoveSpeed.label: Binshō Step
LanguageData.Hediffs_MoveSpeed.description: Thank you for letting me experience all the flavors of the world!\nKnowledge is power, and what better way to learn than to eat, eat, eat! Kanpai!
